about_the_game:
This Pack Features

  • Concept art
  • CG art as seen in-game
  • Character art as seen in-game
  • Several images in 4K resolution that you can use as wallpapers
  • Maps of in-game locations
  • Commentary by the devs
  • Some extra artwork

Please Note

The files contained in this DLC provide no in-game content nor enriching life experiences, just some random cool stuff to look at for like 15 minutes. Please only buy this if you're interested in supporting the developers of Paper Lily.

Spoiler Warning

It is recommended that you finish Paper Lily Chapter 1 before looking at these files.

How to Open

You'll find the files in a folder called "EXTRA", accessible by right clicking Paper Lily - Chapter 1 in your library and selecting Manage → Browse Local Files

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depictions of blood and light gore. Contains swearing.
